Dating: SCORPION/SEREQ (not before); NEW KINGDOM; SCORPION/SEREQ (not after)
Name: Statuette of a baboon
Description: Statuette represents a baboon squatting on a base with its front side shaped as six steps. The surface is polished, the details of mane are engraved. The statuette may be a part of a group representing a scribe protected by a baboon, a manifestation of the god Thoth, a patron of script.
